content.da: Billede til deling på sociale medier
content.nb: Bilde for deling på sosiale medier
content.nl: Afbeelding voor delen via social media.
content.pt-PT: Imagem de partilha nas redes sociais
content.th: รูปภาพสำหรับแชร์ลงโซเชียล

info.da: Vis ved deling af link på sociale medier. [Få mere at vide](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniaturebilleder.
info.de: Wird angezeigt, wenn ein Link über Social Media geteilt wird. [Mehr Informationen](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) über Bild-Miniaturansichten.
info.en: Shown when sharing a link on social media. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) about image thumbnails.
info.es: Aparece cuando se comparte un enlace en una red social. [Más información sobre las miniaturas](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/).
info.fi: Näkyy, kun jaat linkin sosiaaliseen mediaan. [Lisätietoja](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) kuvien pikkukuvista.
info.fr: S'affiche lorsqu'un lien est partagé sur les réseaux sociaux. [En savoir plus sur](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) les images miniatures.
info.hi: सोशल मीडिया पर लिंक शेयर करते समय दिखाना. [इमेज थंबनेल के बारे में](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) और अधिक जानें .
info.it: Mostrata quando si condivide un link sui social media. [Maggiori informazioni](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sulle immagini di anteprima.
info.ja: ソーシャルメディアでリンクがシェアされると表示されます。[サムネイル画像についての](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)について詳しく知る。
info.ko: 소셜 미디어에서 링크 공유 시 표시 [이미지 썸네일에 대해 자세히 알아보기](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)
info.ms: Ditunjukkan apabila berkongsi pautan di media sosial. [Ketahui lebih lanjut](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) tentang imej imej kecil.
info.nb: Vist når en kobling deles i sosiale medier. [Finn ut mer](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniatyrbilder.
info.nl: Wordt weergegeven wanneer u een link deelt via social media. [Meer informatie](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) over miniatuurafbeeldingen.
info.pt-BR: Apresentada ao compartilhar um link nas redes sociais. [Saiba mais](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sobre miniaturas de imagens.
info.pt-PT: Apresentada ao partilhar uma ligação nas redes sociais. [Saiba mais](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) sobre miniaturas de imagem.
info.sv: Visas när du delar en länk på sociala medier. [Läs mer](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) om miniatyrbilder.
info.th: แสดงเมื่อแชร์ลิงก์บนโซเชียลมีเดีย [ดูข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/) เกี่ยวกับรูปภาพขนาดย่อ
info.zh-CN: 在社交媒体上分享链接时显示。[详细了解](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)缩略图。
info.zh-TW: 在社群媒體上分享連結時顯示。[深入瞭解圖片縮圖的相關資訊。](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images/)

content.th: ตัวเลือกการแชร์

label.zh-TW: 在 Twitter 上發佈推文

label.th: ปักหมุดบน Pinterest

info.en: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
info.hi: 32 x 32 पिक्सेल के आकार का कर दिया जाएगा
info.nb: Vil skaleres ned til 32 x 32 px
info.sv: Kommer skalas ned till 32 x 32 px
info.th: จะถูกลดขนาดลงเป็น 32 x 32 พิกเซล
info.zh-TW: 將會縮小為 32 x 32 像素
